alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 15 at 2:44AM MDT until March 15 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 70 mph. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until 3 PM today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing snow is expected in open and exposed areas where snowpack exists, mainly around Jeffrey City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts are likely to occur through about 10 AM. Local gusts to near 70 mph are possible on Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper. * MEASURED WIND GUSTS THROUGH 2 AM..73 mph on the south side of Casper, 71 mph along Interstate 25 at Hat Six road.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
